name: Zenambience
0:
”Alexa, launch zen ambience”
”I want to listen to the ocean”
”Alexa, ask zen ambience to open the ocean”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen ambience
des:
This skill proposes 4 types of sound streaming :
- the sound of the ocean
- the sound of the countryside with birds singing
- the sound of a rainforest with a waterfall
- a relaxation music

In order to access directly a sound without being prompted by the welcome message, you have a shortcut when launching the skill. For example, in order to listen to the ocean, say:
"Alexa, ask zen ambience to open the ocean"

You can therefore use the following sentences when you want a direct access to a specific sound
"Alexa, ask zen ambience to open the ocean"
"Alexa, ask zen ambience to open the countryside"
"Alexa, ask zen ambience to open the rainforest"
"Alexa, ask zen ambience to open a zen music"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
